TEXT.S: zyugi' mzyugi' sun na Tayal hya' ga, aring sa ini' uwah na' qu Gipun hga, nanak yaquw mnwah mgaga' squ ryax na magal ina' ga nanu' si kiy min'aring mtalah lga yasa qu mutuw mzyugi'. mnhhway qmara' sun maha zyugi' na Tayal balay hya' ga, nanu' qu sun maha mnhhway qmara' ka yasa siy s'rux ini' 'nrawmul iyal, ruw mnhawhway mkura' tay 'zil, ini' ga tay 'llaw mshzi'.
